review: I had a wonderful experience at Swasthya, where I visited a dental doctor couple in Chennai. Their clinic is impeccably maintained, equipped with the most modern tools and technology. The doctors provided clear and thorough explanations, making me feel at ease throughout my visit. I highly recommend Swasthya for top-notch dental care in Chennai.
